page.title: 02MILL AND WISHING WELL,UPWEY
page.content: {THE MILL}WAS BUILT IN 1802 AND WAS OWNED BY THE GOULD FAMILY BUT NOW IS OWNED BY MR.MEECH.THE WATER-WHEEL HAD TO BE REPLACED BUT NOTHING ELSE HAS ALTERED.THE MILL IS ONE OF FOUR MILLS ALONG THE RIVER WEY.THE MILL IS NOT IN USE BUT THERE IS A FISH FARM ON THE GROUNDS.THE MILL CAN BE VIEWED BY ARRANGEMENT WITH THE OWNERS. THEY STARTED TO DIG THE PONDS IN 1977,BUT IT DID NOT OPEN UNTIL 1978.NOW THE FISH FARM ONLY SELLS ADULT AND BABY TROUT. { UPWEY WISHING WELL}WAS A VERY OLD SPRING AND IN THE PAST PEOPLE THOUGHT THAT IT HEALED WOUNDS,CUTS,AND BRUISES.IN 1877 A NOVEL WAS WRITTEN WHICH CLAIMED THAT THE SPRING HAD MAGIC HEALING POWERS.THE WELL WAS BUILT AS A RESULT OF THE NOVEL AND IS NOW POPULAR WITH VISITORS.
